title: [Sherlock] Formalize the AI-Cognitive Documentation Framework (AI-CDF)
description: Define the principles and structure of the AI-CDF, a new framework for creating and maintaining documentation that is optimized for AI agent consumption. This includes defining the three pillars: Dynamic Mission Brief, Operations Manual, and Living Documentation Protocol.

acceptance_criteria.text: Produce a formal document detailing the AI-CDF.
The document must clearly define the purpose and structure of the 'AI_OPERATIONS_MANUAL.md'.
The document must specify the purpose and placement of '_CONTEXT.md' files.
